subject.normal: [ViewCVS] Differences between the 1.0-dev-r2 and HEAD on Sourceforge???

headers.subject: RE: [ViewCVS] Differences between the 1.0-dev-r2 and HEAD on Sourceforge???
headers.x-spam-status: No, score=0.0 required=5.0 tests=BAYES_50 autolearn=disabled version=3.2.4

body.para: Correction to my previous post. You should try removing lines 2052-2062 which are:

-- snip -- line = fp.readline() if not line: raise debug.ViewcvsException('Missing output from co.
' 'fname="%s". url="%s"' % (filename, where))

match = _re_co_filename.match(line) if not match: raise debug.ViewcvsException('First line of co output is not the filename.
' 'Line was: %s
' 'fname="%s". url="%s"' % (line, filename, where)) filename = match.group(1) -- snip --
